title: Kalis-Navidad!
body:
Puns make for the best Christmas Skins.

To bind her team mates, she gives them a present, and they're happy instead of dying because it's a cute teddy bear!
Her Q is a sharpened candy cane (well, so are all her auto-attacks, for that matter)
Her W's take on the form of chained ghosts, like those of The Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
Her E rends the candy canes, they explode in a puff of red and green powder and candy cane bits fly out around her.
Her R drags her team mate in, as usual, but when they're thrown, they leave a trail of all things holiday-ish behind them.
